page.title: 13 N.W. TRAFFIC FLOWS
page.content: he A120 route west of Stortford along the line of the Roman Stone Street is a 2 lane single carriageway road inadequate for modern traffic flows.A northern by-pass completed in 1979 has partially relieved congestion in the town centre but is only 2/3 lanes wide. Traffic enters the by-pass via a roundabout at 0547 0222.Between 9.50am & 10.20am on friday,12th July,1985 the no. of vehicles using the roundabout were- out of Stortford on A1250 114 into Stortford on A1250 133 from the west on A120 217 going west on A120 185 from northern by-pass 101 into northern by-pass 84
